mapper.select: SELECT S.*, M.MEM_NAME FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEM_CD = M.MEM_CD WHERE S.CODE_CD = #{codeCd} AND SCH_FK = #{schFk} AND SCH_SDATE BETWEEN #{schSdate} AND #{schEdate}
SELECT SCH.*, SUR.SUR_NUM FROM SCHEDULE SCH JOIN SURGERY SUR ON SCH.SCH_FK = SUR_CD WHERE MEM_CD = #{memCd} AND CODE_CD = 15 AND SCH_SDATE > NOW() ORDER BY SCH.SCH_SDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( MEM_CD, CODE_CD, SCH_FK, SCH_SDATE, SCH_EDATE, SCH_DESC, SCH_RDATE ) VALUES ( #{memCd}, #{codeCd}, #{schFk}, #{schSdate}, #{schEdate}, #{schDesc}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEP_NAME NOT IN ('가발령')
SELECT M.*, D.DEP_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD WHERE M.DEP_CD = #{depCd} ORDER BY M.DEP_CD, M.MEM_NAME
SELECT M.*, D.DEP_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD WHERE M.DEP_CD NOT IN (1) ORDER BY M.DEP_CD, M.MEM_NAME

SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE MEM_CD = #{memCd} AND ( (SCH_SDATE BETWEEN #{schSdate} AND #{schEdate}) OR (SCH_EDATE BETWEEN #{schSdate} AND #{schEdate}) OR (#{schSdate} BETWEEN SCH_SDATE AND SCH_EDATE) OR (#{schEdate} BETWEEN SCH_SDATE AND SCH_EDATE) ) ORDER BY CODE_CD DESC
